titles: The doctrine of faith wherein are practically handled ten principall points, which explain the nature and vse of it / by Iohn Rogers ...
author: Rogers, John, 1572?-1636.
publisher: Printed for N.N. and William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop at the entring into Po[p]es-head-Alley out of Lumbar-street,
notes: Imperfect: faded, stained and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
